<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="controls_whileUntil" id="k3,hdiw[y!A2Lk|RX=qr" x="202" y="103"><field name="MODE">WHILE</field><value name="BOOL"><block type="logic_boolean" id="D*$a9HImBm|u;o}/^()+"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="robot_move" id="[lR@,mUt/V8Z$C/A_!qn"><value name="DISTANCE"><shadow type="math_number" id="*}DK$/@O^d*^(lg^9aPm"><field name="NUM">1</field></shadow></value><next><block type="robot_turn" id="3b1iv@M8c~4`1pfq=acI"><value name="DISTANCE"><shadow type="math_number" id="PCa?r;oupY6MUYW+{qgT"><field name="NUM">1</field></shadow></value><next><block type="robot_sleep" id="{gLJN%IO_,|Ri+yd_4XH"><value name="DURATION"><shadow type="math_number" id="ku*j.*QHVtq|8.F7L?gC"><field name="NUM">1</field></shadow></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></xml>

while true do
  Robot:move(1)
  Robot:turn(1)
  Robot:sleep(1)
  end;

while true do
  Robot:move(2)
  Robot:turn(1)

  end;
